title: Spotify finally arrives on Wear OS, but it's missing the most important feature | Trusted Reviews
description: ![]()### Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how to enable it](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/how-to-enable-alexa-whisper-mode-echo-3607478 "Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how toenable it")  * That appears to suggest it will be added in the future, but at present the appis limited to connected streaming online. Those who’ve been patiently awaitingthe app will need to hang tough for now.Currently, the Google Play Music app for Wear OS gives users the opportunityto download tracks for offline playback by tapping a download option next toalbums, playlists and radio stations within the app.The rollout of the feature appears to be limited at present because it is notyet appearing on the Google Play Store. The company says it’s coming to allWear OS users in the coming week.**Was the Spotify app your number one demand for Wear OS? Let us know@TrustedRevierws on Twitter.**
